segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting so patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, and it’s kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her brother is risking a fall just to get her one, and she doesn’t seem worried at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she trusts him completely, even though he’s about to topple over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is creeping closer, and I hope they don’t slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes is completely oblivious to all of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl would still be so calm if she knew how dangerous this was.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so quiet, but my heart is racing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but I don’t want to spoil their moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a strange mix of innocence and impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
